#summary The head profile attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

== Usage ==
The profile attribute allows one to point to a page which instructs a User-Agent how to interpret and understand a document. A current use of this is GRDDL, which allows you to describe a mechanism to extract RDF metadata from the document.

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `profile` attribute on the following elements:

  * [HeadElement <head>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
